heading.value: We Cover India, You Discover India
More than a Vacation, a Discovery

subText.value: Access 100+ resorts across India and the world, where a universe of experiences opens up for you. Relax by the beach in Goa. Stay in an igloo in Manali. Watch the Northern Lights put up a  spectacular show in Finland. Dine in a tree-house in Munnar. There’s so much waiting for you.

With access to 100+ resorts in India and abroad, no two holidays will ever be the same. Stay at your favourites destinations or make a list of new ones to explore. By the time you decide upon your magical holiday, we would have added some more.
Goa, Madgaon
Goa, Varca
Goa, Madgaon

The world is a large place and we’d like you to experience it in all its beauty and wonder. Which is why, we keep expanding our network of resorts to offer you more than you can imagine. To create new experiences, new exploration, new moments of magic for you.
Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Port Blair
Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Port Blair
Andaman and Nicobar Islands, Port Blair

Experience the world of Club Mahindra with Magic Stream. Go on an
              immersive voyage relishing enchanting landscapes, fascinating
              cultures, and awe-inspiring adventure across the globe.

A Date Night with Sizzle and Sparkle

subText.value: A holiday is more than just sightseeing. It’s about enjoying exclusive experiences that make everyone envious. Like living in unique accommodations across different terrains. And showing off new skills you just learnt. That’s what being a Club Mahindra member is all about! The experiences and the privileges!

descText.value: Welcome to Club Mahindra, where we believe that the best memories are made during family vacations. For the past 26 years, Mahindra Holidays & Resorts India Limited (MHRIL) has been a proud venture of the Mahindra Group, revolutionizing the way families holiday through our unique vacation ownership business model.

With a firm commitment to fulfilling the dreams of our members, we have earned the trust of over 2,81,000 families who have experienced the magic of Club Mahindra. Our membership program is designed with a focus on family vacations, ensuring that every member enjoys the best experiences tailored to their needs.

When it comes to accommodations, we offer a range of options to suit every family's needs. From cozy studios to spacious 1-bedroom and 2-bedroom rooms, we ensure that families can holiday together and stay together.

At Club Mahindra, we are dedicated to crafting unforgettable holiday experiences that go beyond just accommodation. We invite you to embark on a journey with us, where cherished memories are created, and family bonds are strengthened. Join our community of passionate travellers and become a part of the Club Mahindra family today.

Club Mahindra has collection of 125+ resorts spread across diverse terrains in India and abroad. Whether you prefer the serenity of hill stations, the allure of beaches, the tranquility of waterfronts, the charm of heritage cities, or the thrill of wildlife, we have a resort that will cater to your holiday needs. As our membership grows, we continue to expand our resort offerings, ensuring that our members have an extensive array of choices for their holiday destinations.

heading.value: More than a Vacation, a Discovery
We Cover India, You Discover India

subText.value: From adventure activities to nature walks. From staying in an igloo to dining on a tree. From experiencing ancient traditions to contemporary arts. Our signature experiences enrich relationships by helping families rediscover the joy of spending time with each other.

highlightText.value: Pick some experiences that you love!

subText.value: With access to 100+ awe-inspiring resorts in India and abroad, the world opens itself upto you. Filled with over 2000 enriching experiences and joyous moments. Unwind in luxurious floating cottages, tree houses, cabins, tents, ice igloos and pool villas. Your membership offers you all this and more.

Let your hair down… be young again… and feel happy and free. Archery, horse riding, ATV bikes, paintball – HappyHub has tonnes of activities that will excite you as much as your kids. Want to learn something creative? Try pottery or cooking…or simply break out into your best Bollywood moves!

descriptionText.value: It was like our own personal space to relax in the lap of nature at Binsar Valley.
I felt like a royal during my Rajasthan holiday with Club Mahindra, from experiencing a royal welcome to a royal dinner setting created for us.
With Club Mahindra, we pay almost the same rate for a holiday in India or abroad and no worries about changing exchange rates. As we plan in advance, we also get good airfare deals.
Club Mahindra has actually brought us closer to our children as we now take holidays together regularly and are able to spend quality time together.
It was like our own personal space to relax in the lap of nature at Binsar Valley.

highlightText.value: About Club Mahindra Gir  Gujarat Resort in Junagadh

subText.value: Enjoy the splendour of the great outdoors in the breath-taking Gir Sanctuary. Fall in love with the extraordinary wildlife. A perfect family holiday filled with precious moments awaits you at our Gir resort

highlightText.value: A Day at Club Mahindra Gir Resort

subText.value: Break the children away from their internet obsession. Indulge them in activities like aqua zorbing, archery and magic workshops. Skip along the winding paths of a serene nature walk. Dance till your feet hurt at our tribal nights and get a taste of the local culture only at Club Mahindra Gir.

itemText.value: Junagadh Fort and Somnath Temple Trip

highlightText.value: Experiences at Club Mahindra Gir Resort

subText.value: Your family holiday will be a delight for the little ones with air hockey matches and arts and craft classes. From safari rides to frolicking on bumpy chakada rides, you’ll be grinning from ear to ear with the host of exciting things to do in Gir.

itemText.value: A Date Night with Sizzle and Sparkle
Admire the Portuguese Architecture in Diu

highlightText.value: Club Mahindra Gir Resort Room Types

subText.value: Just because you’re close to the great wilderness, doesn’t mean you have to give up on state-of-the-art amenities. Relax in your room, watching your favourite movies with the entire family on television and DVD. And get your much needed anytime re-energiser; a tea/coffee maker in every room.
2 Adults + 1 Child

highlightText.value: FAQs on Club Mahindra Gir  Gujarat Resort

accordionHeader.value: What are the room amenities at Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: Lounge in your room, watch your favourite movies with the entire family on television and DVD. And, get your much-needed break-time beverage with a tea/coffee maker available in every room.

accordionHeader.value: Is parking available at Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: Yes, parking is available at Club Mahindra Gir.

accordionHeader.value: What are the top USPs of Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: Club Mahindra Gir is nestled right next to the Gir Wildlife Sanctuary, the exclusive home to the majestic Asiatic lions. This resort is a one of a kind jungle resort giving visitors a chance to immerse themselves in nature and witness stunning wildlife, all with the comforts and luxuries of a Club Mahindra resort.

accordionHeader.value: How do I reach Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: It is possible to reach Club Mahindra Gir by rail, road and air. The nearest airport is at Diu, which is 105 kms away. Otherwise, you can travel by rail to Veraval station which is only 45 kms from the resort.

accordionHeader.value: What is the best time to visit Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: The best time to visit Gir is in the winter months, between November and February. The mild and pleasant weather will give you a chance to make the most of the outdoor activities and since this season is easier on the animals as well, you’ll have a higher chance to spot the wildlife.

accordionHeader.value: What are the room amenities at Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: Lounge in your room, watch your favourite movies with the entire family on television and DVD. And, get your much-needed break-time beverage with a tea/coffee maker available in every room.

accordionHeader.value: Is parking available at Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: Yes, parking is available at Club Mahindra Gir.

accordionHeader.value: What are the top USPs of Club Mahindra Gir?

accordionBody.value: Club Mahindra Gir is nestled right next to the Gir Wildlife Sanctuary, the exclusive home to the majestic Asiatic lions. This resort is a one of a kind jungle resort giving visitors a chance to immerse themselves in nature and witness stunning wildlife, all with the comforts and luxuries of a Club Mahindra resort.
